thread.title: Bce colloca 2,159 mld euro in p/t 7 gg, in scadenza 2,418 mld Bond

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce colloca 2,159 mld euro in p/t 7 gg, in scadenza 2,418 mld Bond
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 23 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank announced the following results for its latest liquidity providing operation: Main Refinancing Operation-Allotment Intended Volume: Reference Number: 20180005 Min Allotment: Transaction Type: Reverse Transactions Fixed Rate: 0.00 % Operation Type: Liquidity Providing Max Bid Limit: Procedure: Standard Tender Max Bids per Cpty: 1 Tender Date: 23/01/2018 11:30 Marg. Rate: Start Date: 24/01/2018 % of All. at Fixed Rate: 100 Maturity Date: 31/01/2018 Tot Amount Allotted: 2159.2 mn Duration (days): 7 Weight. Avg. Allot. Rate: Tot Bid Amount: 2159.2 mn Auction Type: Fixed Rate Tender Tot Number of Bidders: 39 Allotment Method: Min Rate (bids): Max Rate (bids): ///Estimate on 23/01/2018 of the average autonomous factors for the period 22/01/2018 to 30/01/2018 amounts to EUR 1177.0 bn. Benchmark allotment based on the ECB's liquidity forecast as of 23/01/2018 amounts to EUR -564.0 bn. For general information on the calculation of the benchmark allotment amount, please see www.ecb.europa.eu/mopo/liq/html/index.en.html as well as ECB page Operational Communications./// This page is updated by Thomson Reuters based on data disseminated by the ECB. For more information refer to here
